alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 12:14AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Jefferson, northwestern Madison, central Lowndes and southern Brooks Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1213 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near I-75 At Exit 16 to near Monticello. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Quitman, Valdosta, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Greenville, Dills, Lois, Hamburg, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou, Lovett, Nankin, Casa Blanco, Empress, Clyattville, Blue Springs, Montivilla, I-75 At Exit 11 and Ashville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
